BEGININPUT
BEGINCONTEXT
url: https://www.biography.com/scientist/albert-einstein
ENDCONTEXT
Albert Einstein, one of the most influential physicists of the 20th century, developed the theory of relativity, which revolutionized the scientific approach to time, space, matter, energy, and gravity. Einstein's work laid much of the groundwork for the development of atomic power and the atomic bomb .

ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
What did Albert Einstein develop and how has his work influenced science?

ENDINSTRUCTION

Albert Einstein developed the theory of relativity, which revolutionized the way scientists approach time, space, matter, energy, and gravity. His work laid the groundwork for the development of atomic power and the atomic bomb. Einstein's theories have had a profound impact on modern physics and continue to shape our understanding of the universe.

ENDRESPONSE
